item.title: GCEA For Those About To Strum - Ukulele Rocker Design Cognac
item.description: A cool design for ukulele players who enjoy hard rock and heavy metal music and mostly play their uke in standard C-tuning. It shows the letters G, C, E and A in a hard rock style font separated by a ukulele icon, the text “FOR THOSE ABOUT TO” in a serif font and the word strum with 4 strings cut out. Keep on rocking and strumming! • Also buy this artwork on apparel, stickers, phone cases, and more.

item.title: Heartbeat Ukulele Blue Design for Uke Players
item.description: This design is for musicians who’s hearts beat to the sound of the ukulele. It consists of the drawing of a heartbeat line, a.k.a. electrocardiogram (EKG or ECG), and the outline of a ukulele slightly left from the middle. / Show your love for the uke with this design on a shirt or one of the other available products. It also makes for a great gift to someone who loves to play this awesome instrument. • Also buy this artwork on apparel, stickers, phone cases, and more.

item.title: Heartbeat Ukulele Design rose pour les joueurs Uke
item.description: Cette conception est pour des musiciens qui battent des coeurs au son du ukulele. Il consiste en le dessin d'une ligne de battement de coeur, aka électrocardiogramme (EKG ou ECG), et le contour d'un ukulélé légèrement à gauche du milieu. Montrez votre amour pour l'uke avec cette conception sur une chemise ou l'un des autres produits disponibles. Cela fait aussi un grand cadeau à quelqu'un qui aime jouer cet instrument génial. • Also buy this artwork on apparel, stickers, phone cases et more.
